column4: Where can i get ubuntu (all in iso, not seperate workstation and server).
The only differences between the types of Ubuntu are the default installed packages, so no matter what you get, you'll be able to customise it to your needs
om26er: ok. (i just want to play with it this weekend and avoid using Fedora i am tired a bit installing dovecot/smtp tail/ bla bla..., nothing still found organised ) maybe ubuntu.
